ANOVA of Individual Puncta Volumes

```{r}
temp$Rep<-as.factor(temp$Rep)

anovaPunctaVol<-aov(temp$LC3Volume~temp$Type*temp$BvsS+temp$Rep+temp$Rep:temp$Type)
summary(anovaPunctaVol)
TukeyHSD(anovaPunctaVol)

anovaPunctaLogVol<-aov(temp$LogLC3Volume~temp$Type*temp$BvsS+temp$Rep+temp$Rep:temp$Type)
summary(anovaPunctaLogVol)
TukeyHSD(anovaPunctaLogVol)

anovaPunctaInt<-aov(temp$LC3MeanObjIntensity~temp$Type*temp$BvsS+temp$Rep+temp$Rep:temp$Type)
summary(anovaPunctaInt)
TukeyHSD(anovaPunctaInt)

anovaLC3MOC<-aov(temp$MandersLC3MOC~temp$Type*temp$BvsS+temp$Rep+temp$Rep:temp$Type)
summary(anovaLC3MOC)
TukeyHSD(anovaLC3MOC)

anovaLAMPInt<-aov(temp$LAMP1MeanObjIntensity~temp$Type*temp$BvsS+temp$Rep+temp$Rep:temp$Type)
summary(anovaLAMPInt)
TukeyHSD(anovaLAMPInt)
```
